attributes.action: Stop kids from watching internet pornography
attributes.additional_details:
I want every ISP and major search engine to make watching soft internet pornography harder for any persons under the age of 18 years because this kind of material shouldn't of been heard of by a for an example, an 9.5 year old. And by so doing this, reduces numbers of cyberbullying victims to do with bad links.

Together, we can stop soft porn reaching the hands of under-18s!!!
